content: round 6 slip_stitch in corner space 1ch 1sc 4ch 1sc in same space **3ch skip double_crochet 1dc in chain space 4dc *2ch skip 2 1dc in chain space 1dc 1dc in chain space 2ch skip 2 2dc † 2dc in chain space 2ch skip 2 2dc in chain space 2dc repeat from * to 5 sts before corner space ending last repeat at † 2dc 1dc in chain space 3ch skip double_crochet 1sc 4ch 1sc in corner space repeat from ** to 5 sts before beg corner space 2dc 1dc in chain space 3ch skip double_crochet slip_stitch into first single_crochet round 7 slip_stitch in corner space 1ch 1sc 4ch 1sc in same space **3ch skip single_crochet 1dc in chain space 3dc *2ch skip 2 2dc in chain space 3ch skip 3 2dc in chain space 2ch skip 2 2dc † 2dc in chain space 2dc repeat from * to last double_crochet before corner ending last repeat at † 1dc 1dc in chain space 3ch skip single_crochet 1sc 4ch 1sc in corner space repeat from ** to last double_crochet before corner 1dc 1dc in chain space 3ch skip single_crochet to slip_stitch into first single_crochet round 8 slip_stitch in corner space 5ch counts as 1dc 2ch 2dc in same space **2ch skip single_crochet 1dc in chain space 2dc *2ch skip 2 2dc in chain space 7ch skip 2dc 3ch 2dc 2dc in chain space 2ch skip 2 2dc repeat from * to last chain space before corner space 1dc in chain space 2ch 2dc 3ch 2dc in corner space repeat from ** to last chain space before beg corner space 1dc in chain space 2ch 1dc in start space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 5ch round 9 slip_stitch in corner space 4ch counts as 1tr 2tr lp 3tr in same space **lp skip 2dc 3tr in chain space lp skip 3dc 1tr 2dc 1hdc in chain space *5ch skip 2dc 1sc into 3ch space from r7 working over and trapping chain s from r7 & 8 5ch skip 2dc 1hdc 2dc 1tr in chain space lp † skip 2 1tr 2dc 1hdc repeat from * to 7st before corner space ending the last repeat at † skip 3 3tr in chain space lp skip 2 3tr lp 3tr in corner space repeat from ** to 7sts before beg corner space skip 3 3tr in chain space lp skip 2 slip_stitch into top of beg 4ch finishing weave in any remaining ends if you haven t done so already you may now wish to block your blanket if you have already blocked the
